ingredients.ingredient: 1 (29 ounce) can sliced peaches in juice, drained, reserving juice

cookingTips: Don't overmix the topping batter; lumps will smooth out while baking
The batter will rise up around the fruit as it bakes, creating a perfect ratio of topping to filling
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream for the classic cobbler experience
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain to the user why self-rising flour is key to this simple cobbler, and how the batter naturally rises to create the ideal texture.
